name: api_rendering_SkinnedMeshRenderer

properties.name: bones
properties.description: The bones used to skin the mesh.

properties.name: forceMatrixRecalculationPerRender
properties.description: Forces the Skinned Mesh to recalculate its matricies when rendered

properties.name: quality
properties.description: The maximum number of bones per vertex that are taken into account during skinning.

properties.name: sharedMesh
properties.description: The mesh used for skinning.

properties.name: skinnedMotionVectors
properties.description: Specifies whether skinned motion vectors should be used for this renderer.

properties.name: updateWhenOffscreen
properties.description: If enabled, the Skinned Mesh will be updated when offscreen. If disabled, this also disables updatin

properties.name: vertexBufferTarget
properties.description: The intended target usage of the skinned mesh GPU vertex buffer.

properties.name: BakeMesh
properties.description: Creates a snapshot of SkinnedMeshRenderer and stores it in mesh.

properties.name: GetBlendShapeWeight
properties.description: Returns the weight of a BlendShape for this Renderer.

properties.name: GetPreviousVertexBuffer
properties.description: Retrieves a GraphicsBuffer that provides direct access to the GPU vertex buffer for this skinned mes

properties.name: GetShaderUserValue
properties.description: Returns the custom value assigned to this renderer.

properties.name: GetVertexBuffer
properties.description: Retrieves a GraphicsBuffer that provides direct access to the GPU vertex buffer for this skinned mes

properties.name: SetBlendShapeWeight
properties.description: Sets the weight of a BlendShape for this Renderer.

properties.name: SetShaderUserValue
properties.description: Assign a custom value to this renderer.

properties.name: Destroy
properties.description: Removes a GameObject, component, or asset.

properties.name: DestroyImmediate
properties.description: Destroys the specified object immediately. Use with caution and in Edit mode only.

properties.name: DontDestroyOnLoad
properties.description: Do not destroy the target Object when loading a new Scene.

properties.name: FindAnyObjectByType
properties.description: Retrieves any active loaded object of Type type.

properties.name: FindFirstObjectByType
properties.description: Retrieves the first active loaded object of Type type.

properties.name: FindObjectsByType
properties.description: Retrieves a list of all loaded objects of Type type.
